summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Apollo's Hideaway resort website. All major functionality working including full booking flow with Stripe integration, navigation, gallery lightbox, contact form, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with neoclassical columns hero image
Navigation works across all pages (Home, About, Gallery, Booking, Contact)
Gallery displays all 12 images with working lightbox functionality
Booking Step 1: Villa selection from all 10 villas
Booking Step 2: Date selection with calendar (blocks past dates)
Booking Step 3: Guest information form (name, email, phone, guest count)
Stripe payment integration creates checkout session successfully
Payment redirects to Stripe with correct amount ($850 for 1 night)
Contact form submission works with backend integration
All 10 villas initialized in database with proper data
All 9 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Proper color scheme (terracotta, marble white, garden green, gold)
